item.title: Doom and Animal Crossing
item.description: So Doom Eternal came out recently, which made me want to go back and actually finish Doom 2016. I started it back when it came out and really enjoyed it but I got distracted fairly quickly. So when the industry was hyping up Eternal, I thought I’d jump back in. Shit, that game is great. Doom 2016’s arena combat is so addictive. I was sad when I finished it, I didn’t want to leave that red-tinted world.
